title: A summary or compendium of the life of the most famous philosopher Renatus Descartes written originally in Latin by Peter Borellus ... ; to which is also added an epitome of his life by Marcus Zurius Boxbornius ...
author: Borel, Pierre, 1620?-1671.
publisher: Printed by E. Okes for George Palmer ...,
notes: Translation of: Vitae Renati Cartesii sumi philosophi compendium.
